Package me.dreamdevs.randomlootchest.api.inventory

Class ItemMenu

java.lang.Object
me.dreamdevs.randomlootchest.api.inventory.ItemMenu
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChestEditMenu, ReloadMenu
public class ItemMenu extends Object
A Menu controlled by ItemStacks in an Inventory.
